name: ABC
text: India should commit to carbon neutrality by ending fossil fuel subsidies and investing in clean solar power as it mobilizes trillion of dollars to recover from the coronavirus pandemic, the U.N. chief says. https://t.co/U1zdA4mqZO

name: ABC
text: Melvin Gordon, a running back for the Denver Broncos, spoke to @ABC about the nationwide protests for racial justice that sparked after the police shooting of Jacob Blake, a Black man in Gordon's hometown of Kenosha, Wisconsin. https://t.co/qMXpRFEU56 https://t.co/Z4Z01sr77E

name: ABC
text: Pres. Donald Trump pardons Alice Johnson, who praised him at Republican convention the night before. https://t.co/VqAKbETbXZ

name: ABC
text: For some women in the military, the death and alleged sexual harassment of Fort Hood soldier Vanessa Guillen was a breaking point -- a story all too familiar, of sexual harassment or assault cases not handled properly, they said. https://t.co/dq25nd5Chf

name: ABC
text: BREAKING: Actor Chadwick Boseman, known for starring in blockbuster films like “Black Panther,” has died at 43 following a 4-year battle with colon cancer. https://t.co/75QaWqM1r8
